meta.name: Abhinand K
meta.title: UI/UX Designer
meta.heroTagline: Crafting thoughtful interfaces that feel intuitive
meta.intro: I am a creative and passionate UI/UX designer focused on building user-friendly and visually engaging digital experiences. Skilled in Figma, Adobe XD, and prototyping, I enjoy learning new design trends and creating user-centered solutions that balance usability with aesthetics.

education.course: Diploma in Indian and Foreign Accounts

projects.title: Travel App — Redesign
projects.description: End-to-end UI/UX redesign of a travel booking app focusing on simplified flows and micro-interactions.

projects.title: E-commerce Checkout Flow
projects.description: Streamlined checkout and cart flow with A/B studied microcopy to increase conversions.

projects.title: Dashboard UI — Analytics
projects.description: Data-dense dashboard made approachable through visual hierarchy and concise interactions.
